name: ExtractFiles
description: Extract a variety of archive and compression files such as .7z, .rar, .tar.gz, and .zip.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: archiveFilePatterns
inputs.label: Archive file patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: File paths or patterns of the archive files to extract. Supports multiple lines of minimatch patterns.

inputs.name: destinationFolder
inputs.label: Destination folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Destination folder into which archive files should be extracted.

inputs.name: cleanDestinationFolder
inputs.label: Clean destination folder before extracting
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to clean the destination directory before archive contents are extracted into it.
